alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:52AM CDT until July 20 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sangamon County in central Illinois... East central Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 852 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alexander, or 12 miles east of Jacksonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... New Berlin around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Loami. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 75 and 92. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
